name: Winter Ward
description:
Hey,

Welcome to "Winter Ward"! This game was made by Skyflamme and N0_Way for a game jam so it's simple and short.

Story: 
You're an apprentice to a wizard who needs gems, so he sends you out to find some.

Controls:

D - Attack

Space - Rest or Dig

Programming and Art: Skyflamme

Music and Sound: N0_Way
